title: costtwoaction projecf
body: MetaMask injects a global API into websites visited by its users at window.ethereum. This API allows websites to request users' Ethereum accounts, read data from blockchains the user is connected to, and suggest that the user sign messages and transactions. The presence of the provider object indicates an Ethereum user. We recommend using @metamask/detect-provider (opens new window)to detect our provider, on any
author: 0xAbc6848bFEB8CfDA888eD0C5A3962e9FA7b556A6
